meanings.definition: Chiros (noun): A type of ancient Greek pottery.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed beautiful chiros from ancient Greece.
meanings.sent2: She collected chiros to learn more about Greek history.
meanings.sent3: The chiros on the shelf seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of chiros was a window to the ancient world.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the chiros captured everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Chiros (adjective): Of or relating to the hands.
meanings.sent1: Her chiros movements were graceful and precise.
meanings.sent2: He had a strong chiros grip that impressed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The chiros puppet show was a hit with the children.

meanings.definition: Chiros (verb): To perform manual therapy or massage.
meanings.sent1: She would chiros her clients to help them relax.
meanings.sent2: He learned how to chiros to ease muscle tension.
meanings.sent3: The spa offered a special package for chiros sessions.
